description: A compact cook kit for ultralight adventures for 2. Building on the tried and true Dualist, the new pot now has a new heatsink design that cooks faster than the previous version, meaning your fuel lasts longer so you have to carry less. The light materials and nesting design make it easy to carry for an overnight trip or a longer adventure.Set includes a 1.8L pot with strainer lid, two 590ml insulated cups, two 590ml bowls, two Sip-It lids, two folding foons, and stuff sack.Even-heating hard-anodized aluminum pot has a scratch-proof Teflon® Radiance coating.Pot features a double rolled rim, folding handle and stamped graduations.Nylon lid has an integrated strainer and heat-proof silicone rim.EVA insulated polypropylene mugs and bowls nest together.Welded stuff sack doubles as a small sink or wash basin.Pot holds a 220g canister, a small folding LPG stove and the included dishware. (Note: stove and canister are not included.)
name: GSI Pinnacle Dualist HS
